name: Live?Twin Channel
text: When a monster declares an attack: You can Tribute 1 "Kisikil" or "Lilla" monster; negate that attack. During the End Phase: You can target 1 "Kisikil" or "Lilla" monster in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, or, if you control no monsters, you can add it to your hand instead. You can only use each effect of "Live?Twin Channel" once per turn.
